participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and whimsical, often sees the world through a unique lens.
participant_1.background: My cats are my family, and I don't know what I would do without them. My cosplay costume is coming in the mail, so I'm going to start practicing my makeup this weekend. I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike. I love eating kale. I am allergic to apples yet still eat them.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, values family and enjoys sharing stories.
participant_2.background: My brother and I have been close since childhood, and we bond over our shared love of music. I love all of my beautiful children. I always put my left sock on first. I have none to share my thoughts about the books I read. I run track.

content.text: I once saw a moose cross the road while I was riding my bike.  What is the strangest thing you have seen while out and about?
I once saw a man dressed as a banana riding a bike down the road.  That was pretty strange.
Oh my goodness that sounds amazing!  Did you get a picture?
I did not!  I was too busy trying to figure out if I was hallucinating or not.
Haha I bet!  That is crazy!  Did you see anyone else around?
No, I was the only one on the road at the time.  I think it was a sign that I needed to start paying more attention to my surroundings.
Or maybe it was just a very strange coincidence!  Either way, it is a story you will never forget!
Absolutely!  I am still not sure if I actually saw what I thought I saw or not.
Well, you know what they say, "If you see something, say something."  So next time you see a man dressed as a banana riding a bike, make sure to report it!
Haha, I will do my best
